quests.desc: You are now playing a life changing session of TextWorld! First of all, go to the north. After that, go west. Then, venture west. Following that, take a trip south. Next, go to the south. That done, take a trip west. After that, go north. And then, take the top hat from the workbench in the basement. Then, make an attempt to go south. Next, put the top hat on the table. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You make out a table. What a great pairing of adjectives and nouns! [if there is something on the s_0]On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a recreation zone like it isn't some huge deal.

 You see a stand. The stand is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_2] On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a sauna.

 You scan the room, seeing a cuboid locker.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cuboid locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cuboid locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a bench. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You've entered a closet.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just entered a chamber.

 You see a safe. Now why would someone leave that there?[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_1]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You are in a cookhouse. A normal kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A typical one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can make out a workbench. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the workbench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]The workbench appears to be empty. You move on, clearly depressed by TextWorld.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a laundry place.

 Look over there! a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_4] On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_4]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cubicle. An ordinary kind of place.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bedroom. A standard one.

 You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The locker is empty![end if] You can see a bookshelf. The bookshelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_5] On the bookshelf you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty, unfortunately. This always happens![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a launderette. A standard kind of place.

 Hey, want to see a dresser? Look over there, a dresser.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_3]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The dresser is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. An usual one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You're now in the cellar.

 You can see a trunk.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The trunk is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in an attic. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You've entered a parlor. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a bedchamber. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You are in a spare room. A typical one.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You've fallen into a typical room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be typical. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the laundromat. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the vault. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You see a Canadian limited edition chest. Now why would someone leave that there?[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The Canadian limited edition chest contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The Canadian limited edition chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can see a shelf. [if there is something on the s_6]On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_6]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]However, the shelf, like an empty shelf, has nothing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a study. You begin looking for stuff.

 Look over there! a coffer. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The coffer is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.desc: it's a stuffy hatch [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: it's an ominous portal [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. Your first objective is to go north. After that, go west. And then, move west. Then, go south. Then, try to move south. With that done, make an attempt to take a trip west. Then, make an attempt to go north. After that, recover the top hat from the workbench. Then, make an attempt to move south. And then, rest the top hat on the table. That's it!
